General.Name: Zaigle Co. Ltd
General.Description: Zaigle Co., Ltd., a well-being company, develops, manufactures, sells, and exports well-being lifestyle products for businesses, restaurants, and households in South Korea, rest of Asia, Europe, Australia, and internationally. The company primarily offers ZAIGLE, an infrared cooking equipment. It also provides grill components, sterilization/sanitation products, fryer/kitchen appliances, home appliances, kitchen/household goods, and health/beauty products. In addition, the company engages in the food services and food distribution businesses. It offers its products through various sales channels, such as home shopping and retail stores of corporations, as well as offline and online channels, and corporate special sales. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
